General purpose Avro utilities.

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

avroSchemaEquals

public static boolean avroSchemaEquals(KijiSchemaTable schemaTable,
                                       AvroSchema first,
                                       AvroSchema second)
                                throws IOException
Compares two AvroSchema objects for equality within the context of the given SchemaTable.

Parameters:
schemaTable - SchemaTable with which to resolve schema UIDs.
first - one AvroSchema object to compare for equality.
second - another AvroSchema object to compare for equality.
Returns:
whether the two objects represent the same Schema.
Throws:
IOException - in case of an error reading from the SchemaTable.

avroSchemaCollectionContains

public static boolean avroSchemaCollectionContains(KijiSchemaTable schemaTable,
                                                   Collection<AvroSchema> schemaCollection,
                                                   AvroSchema element)
                                            throws IOException
Check whether a collection of AvroSchema objects contains a given AvroSchema element, resolving UIDs using the given KijiSchemaTable.

Parameters:
schemaTable - KijiSchemaTable with which to resolve schema UIDs.
schemaCollection - collection of AvroSchemas to check for the presence of the given element.
element - AvroSchema for whose presence to check in schemaCollection.
Returns:
whether schemaCollection contains element after resolving UIDs using schemaTable.
Throws:
IOException - in case of an error reading from the schema table.

getOptionalType

public static org.apache.avro.Schema getOptionalType(org.apache.avro.Schema schema)
Reports whether the given schema is an optional type (ie. a union { null, Type }).

Parameters:
schema - The schema to test.
Returns:
the optional type, if the specified schema describes an optional type, null otherwise.

checkWriterCompatibility

public static AvroUtils.SchemaSetCompatibility checkWriterCompatibility(Iterator<org.apache.avro.Schema> readers,
                                                                        org.apache.avro.Schema writer)
Validates that the provided reader schemas can be used to decode data written with the provided writer schema.

Parameters:
readers - that must be able to be used to decode data encoded with the provided writer schema.
writer - schema to check.
Returns:
a list of compatibility results.

checkReaderCompatibility

public static AvroUtils.SchemaSetCompatibility checkReaderCompatibility(org.apache.avro.Schema reader,
                                                                        Iterator<org.apache.avro.Schema> writers)
Validates that the provided reader schema can read data written with the provided writer schemas.

Parameters:
reader - schema to check.
writers - that must be compatible with the provided reader schema.
Returns:
a list of compatibility results.

checkReaderWriterCompatibility

public static AvroUtils.SchemaPairCompatibility checkReaderWriterCompatibility(org.apache.avro.Schema reader,
                                                                               org.apache.avro.Schema writer)
Validates that the provided reader schema can be used to decode avro data written with the provided writer schema.

Parameters:
reader - schema to check.
writer - schema to check.
Returns:
a result object identifying any compatibility errors.

schemaNameEquals

public static boolean schemaNameEquals(org.apache.avro.Schema reader,
                                       org.apache.avro.Schema writer)
Tests the equality of two Avro named schemas.

Matching includes reader name aliases.

Parameters:
reader - Named reader schema.
writer - Named writer schema.
Returns:
whether the names of the named schemas match or not.

lookupWriterField

public static org.apache.avro.Schema.Field lookupWriterField(org.apache.avro.Schema writerSchema,
                                                             org.apache.avro.Schema.Field readerField)
Identifies the writer field that corresponds to the specified reader field.

Matching includes reader name aliases.

Parameters:
writerSchema - Schema of the record where to look for the writer field.
readerField - Reader field to identify the corresponding writer field of.
Returns:
the writer field, if any does correspond, or None.
